dcterms:description: In the Triangles dataset, each data item is a graph that contains either exactly one triangle (3-clique) or exactly zero triangles. It is generated by sampling both random and k nearest neighbor graphs, with edges belonging to triangles removed until only one or zero triangles remain.
dcterms:title: Triangles Dataset

dcterms:description: The Clique Distance dataset checks whether an approach can find high-order patterns in the data. It is generated by creating a base BA-graph and attaching two cliques to distinct nodes, with labels based on the distance between the cliques.
dcterms:title: Clique Distance Dataset

dcterms:creator: Nino Shervashidze
Pascal Schweitzer
Erik Jan Van Leeuwen
Kurt Mehlhorn
Karsten M Borgwardt
dcterms:description: NCI1 is a dataset used for graph classification tasks, containing chemical compounds represented as graphs.
dcterms:title: NCI1

dcterms:creator: Nino Shervashidze

dcterms:description: MUTAG is a dataset used for graph classification tasks, containing chemical compounds represented as graphs.
dcterms:title: MUTAG
